name: [Physics Jam] Simian Slam
description:
🍌🌴⭐🌴🍌 Flick and Click Your Monkey! ↗️ Flicking a direction to launch your monkey. 👆 Click to let go of vines and other objects.

🙊 Dev: @jwho303
🙈 Art: @smashe_squatch
🙉 Sound: @palmdrive

This is a professional entry to Free Lives Physics Jam 2021 which was done over 10 days. ⚠️ Expect some camera bugginess on resolutions other than 1920x1080.
